de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.render

Class RenderBucketRenderNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.render.RenderBucketRenderNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<RenderBucketRenderNode>

    public class RenderBucketRenderNode
extends Object
implements Comparable<RenderBucketRenderNode>
    A RenderBucketRenderNode is the RenderNode representation of a NiftyContentNode. It stores the Context (texture) as well as the NiftyCanvas for the NiftyContentNode. Created by void on 13.09.15.
